pr_title: Add option to hide thumbnail on lock screen

timeline.bodyText: This switch should be hidden on API <21, since the lockscreen thumbnail was not a feature until Android Lollipop
timeline.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText:
Is there a preference for doing this with xml only or programmatically hiding it with java code.
Edit: preference as in which type is more liked. not as in a setting. I see how this could be misunderstood.
replies.author: XiangRongLin

replies.bodyText: You have to do this programmatically by getting the preference object in the settings fragment for appearance and hiding it
replies.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText:
XML only is also possible, hence my question
You have values/bool.xml with a value being false and values-v22/bool.xml with the same value being true. In the preference xml you then add app:isPreferenceVisible="@bool/{key}"
Same could be done for app:visibility, with the values being strings for gone, invisible and visible.
replies.author: XiangRongLin

replies.bodyText: This looks like obfuscation: even though it works, it's more of a workaround than a real solution. I'd use normal code like it's done in all other PreferenceFragments
replies.author: Stypox
